sources.title: Shield for Murder (widescreen)
sources.description: A film noir bad cop/good cop violent crime drama starring Edmund O'Brien and John Agar. Marla English is the lady in the middle. This one doesn't pull any punches. Well produced. An adaptation of the novel by William P McGiven. Directed by Howard W Koch & Edmund O'Brien. Released in 1954. Complete print. CAST NOTE: Stafford Repp's feature film debut.
